remarks: Condition for weak dominance with a condition reminiscent of ~ wdomd . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2015.)
statement:
brwdom3 $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ Y e. W ) -> ( X ~<_* Y <-> E. f A. x e. X E. y e. Y x = ( f ` y ) ) ) $.
$d X f x y $.
$d Y f x y $.
